Package files

package files
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    Class that determines what a given action is.
    ActionsLeft
    Class that determines how many actions are left.
    Card
    A class to make a card, for use in the game.
    CardLevel
    Enum utilized to determine a card's level.
    CardTypes
    Types of possible cards, also helps to set the effect types.
    Deck
    Class that establishes a deck, for use in the user hand and the overall deck of cards that will be drawn from.
    EffectTypes
    Types of effects that a card can provide
    JavaClient
    A players connection to the game server.
    JavaServer
    A class that represents a game server which players connect to and get their actions from.
    Network
    Class to handle server side operations
    Request
    A network request
    ServerLauncher
    Class that initializes and launches the server
    Status
    Class that manages the turn state.
    Text
    A message
    TurnStates
    Enum for the purpose of controlling the turns
    User
    Class to establish a user's identity and hand.
    VFXMethods
    Main Function Use fadetransition for text
